response.overview: Alone in his cavernous apartment, the seemingly successful Dan finds himself more isolated with the passing of every day. His faceless job in a faceless office has gradually brought about a solitary existence, his past, remembered glory, is beginning to escape to him, and every attempt he makes to escape; to reach out, is thwarted by his own shattered confidence, and a world that does not want to listen.
response.title: Dan the Man
